verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Your love is everlasting; it's an everlasting love newline Your mercy is as new as every rising of the sun newline And Your loving kindness, loving kindness is better than life!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Your grace is all-sufficient; it's an all sufficent grace newline Your power and Your glory are forever on display newline And Your loving kindness, loving kindness is better than life!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh-- it's better, Oh-- newline better than life newline Oh-- so much better, Jesus, newline Your loving kindness is better than life

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Fairest of ten thousand, of ten thousand you are fair newline And nothing in this world could ever measure or compare newline To Your loving kindness, Your loving kindness is better than life!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: All Your ways are just, oh Lord, You're just in all Your ways newline And I will lift my hands, oh Lord, in gratitude and praise newline For Your loving kindness, loving kindness is better than life!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Jesus, Your loving kindness, -- is better than life itself newline Better than life itself newline Jesus, Your loving kindness, -- is better than life itself newline Better than life itself
